mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(seq, id, kakaoid, pw, name, nickname, role, tel, addr, birth, email, tier) VALUES (member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{kakaoid}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, 'USER', #{tel}, #{addr}, #{birth}, #{email}, 5)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw}
